page.title: 03LLANGURIG,POWYS:CLUBS.
page.content: There are{no youth clubs}in the Llangurig block.This is{disgraceful}in the{twentieth century. There is a{Young Farmers' Club}which has been going for{forty years}but it does not have many members.The club meets once a week.Every Christmas they raise money for charity by carol singing. The{Womens' Institute}has been in existence for{thirty-three years.}The majority of the members are elderly. The W.I. provide a party every Christmas for the local school.The W.I. meet once a month. The most{significant thing}about{club {life}in Llangurig is the{lack of it.
